item.title: Spain’s economy keeps growing — why is the country doing so well?
item.description: A booming tourism sector, foreign investment and immigration are among the main pillars supporting economic growth in Spain.

item.title: From the 'Big Stay' to a 'no-hire, no-fire' freeze, labor markets are seeing sizable shifts
item.description: Many workers are staying put in their jobs, while businesses are putting the brakes on hiring or firing.

item.title: Businesses bringing back recession specials could be the latest sign of deteriorating consumer sentiment
item.description: The term "recession" has popped up again as a selling point this summer, perhaps providing a look at how businesses are reacting to consumer sentiment...

item.title: Chocolate lovers, brace yourselves: Prices are rising, but not forever
item.description: "There is this ongoing deficit in the in the market, big depletion of availability of cocoa beans and availability of products," one analyst told CNBC...

item.title: Modi gives tax boon to India's economy amid Trump tariff tensions
item.description: Markets welcomed the news of proposed tax cuts set to bolster domestic consumption in India, which faces the prospect of steep U.S. tariffs.
